item.title: EU to Challenge Poland Over Law Aimed at Opposition Leader Tusk
item.description: The European Commission has challenged Poland at the European Court of Justice over a new law that could be used to target opposition leader Donald Tusk. The law, which was passed by the Polish parliament last week, gives the government the power to strip former prime ministers of their immunity from prosecution.
